# SingleStoreConnectionStringBuilder.PipeName property

The name of the Windows named pipe to use to connect to the server. You must also set [`ConnectionProtocol`](./ConnectionProtocol.md) to NamedPipe to used named pipes.

```csharp
public string PipeName { get; set; }
```
